DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Moxibustion Therapy With Without Smoke Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : To assess effect moxa smoke treatment use moxibustion knee osteoarthritis . Design : This multicentre , randomise , single blind , parallel-group design clinical trial . 138 eligible participant randomly allocate 2 group ( moxibustion group smoke-free moxibustion group ) 1:1 allocation ratio , receive 12 session moxibustion treatment period 4 week , three session per week . Each session last 30 minute . The whole study period 13 week , 1 week run period , 4 week treatment phase , 8 week follow-up phase.The participant receive moxibustion treatment three acupoints ( EX-LE04 , ST35 , ST36 ) . In moxa-free smoke moxibustion group , investigator place purification device ( Shenzhen Conyson Electronic Technology Co , Ltd , C200 moxa smoke purification device , Shenzhen , China ) top moxibustion remove moxa smoke . The primary measurement outcome mean change global scale value Western Ontario McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) pain function score baseline 4 week . The secondary outcome Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) patient global assessment . Investigators assess participant second visit ( start moxibustion treatment ) 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 week respectively baseline .
DOC.criteria: Participants meet follow criterion include : 1. age 40 75 year 2. diagnose knee osteoarthritis formulate American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) . 3. average severity knee pain 7 point visual analogue scale day past month 4. agree paregoric whole treatment phase 5. willingness participate randomize study sign inform consent form . Participants exclude experience : 1. inflammatory disease , include rheumatoid arthritis , cancer , traumatic injury might relate current knee pai 2. autoimmune disease , uncontrolled hypertension 3. diabetes mellitus require insulin injection 4. lifethreatening cardiovascular neurological event within past year 5. chronic respiratory disease , haemorrhagic disorder 6. alcohol drug addiction 7. active infectious disease include tuberculosis 8. significant knee joint deformity 9. knee replacement surgery affect knee 10. knee arthroscopy within past year 11. steroid injection knee joint within past 3 month 12. injection knee joint joint fluid injection within past 6 month 13. accept acupuncture , moxibustion , cup , herbal medicine within past 4 week
